tracks.text: "Shia Labeouf" Live by Rob Cantor. Featuring The Gay Men's Chorus of Los Angeles, The West L.A. Children's Choir, and The Argus Quartet.
Rob Cantor stands in a suit in front of a microphone.
Behind Cantor, lights slowly turn on. There's a string quartet and a men's choir.
A man and woman dance onto the stage.
The man mimes stabbing while the woman mimes running
The male dancer picks up the female dancer and carries her across the stage
The man mimes taking a bite out of the woman's thigh
The man exits, and 4 female dancers form a tight circle.
They hunch and mime walking through underbrush
The dancers grab hands and spin in a circle
4 male dancers enter stage. A black curtain raises, revealing a red backdrop
The male dancers wear giant paper 3D models of Shia Labeouf's face. They mime looking around, while flailing
The women dance with red ribbons. Trapeze artists dangle from the ceiling by red streamers.
The trapezists do splits. 2 men in red shirts do jiu jitsu in the corner
The women and Shia faced dancers pair off and mime fighting and chasing
The dancers drop, red confetti falls, the lights fall
We pan across a massive, empty theater. In the middle, alone, sits Shia Labeouf.
He stands
The lights turn on
He looks around and sits back down.
Cut to black
